location.name: always
location.note:
Location constraints: true
State variables: [x,v] real parts of Eigenvalues: [0,0], imag parts of Eigenvalues: [0,0] Eigenvectors (columns): [ 1,-1 0,2.22044e-16 ]
location.flow: x' == v & v' == -0.999999 with offset support_function( x >= 0 & SLACK2 <= 0.0999999 & SLACK2 >= 0 & SLACK4 <= 0.199999 & SLACK4 >= 0, mapped by x' == 0 & v' == -SLACK2+0.0499999 )

transition.label: hop
transition.assignment: x' == x & v' == -0.75*v with offset support_function( w2 >= -0.0999999 & w2 <= 0.0999999, mapped by x' == 0 & v' == w2 )
